Query.Sql: select distinct apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber, apc.NHSNumber, p.ProcedureDateOPCS as PrimaryProcedureDate, p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure from omop_staging.sus_APC apc inner join omop_staging.sus_OPCSProcedure p on apc.MessageId = p.MessageId where NHSNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.
